    Weather: Terms and Units

    Steffi LaZerte

    2023-09-05

    Source: vignettes/glossary.Rmd
    glossary.Rmd

    This table shows details regarding original column (measurement) names and units of all weather measurements. It further provides links back to the ECCC glossary for more details.

    For details on climate normals measurements, see the glossary_normals vignette.

    Interval ECCC Name Formatted weathercan name units Reference
    hour Date/Time (LST) time ISO date/time NA
    hour Year year year ECCC glossary page
    hour Month month month ECCC glossary page
    hour Day day day ECCC glossary page
    hour Time (LST) hour hour ECCC glossary page
    hour Data Quality qual note ECCC glossary page
    hour Temp (C) temp C ECCC glossary page
    hour Temp Flag temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Dew Point Temp (C) temp_dew C ECCC glossary page
    hour Dew Point Temp Flag temp_dew_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Rel Hum (%) rel_hum % ECCC glossary page
    hour Rel Hum Flag rel_hum_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Precip. Amount (mm) precip_amt mm NA
    hour Precip. Amount Flag precip_amt_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Wind Dir (10s deg) wind_dir 10s deg ECCC glossary page
    hour Wind Dir Flag wind_dir_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Wind Spd (km/h) wind_spd km/h ECCC glossary page
    hour Wind Spd Flag wind_spd_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Visibility (km) visib km ECCC glossary page
    hour Visibility Flag visib_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Stn Press (kPa) pressure kPa ECCC glossary page
    hour Stn Press Flag pressure_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Hmdx hmdx index ECCC glossary page
    hour Hmdx Flag hmdx_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Wind Chill wind_chill index ECCC glossary page
    hour Wind Chill Flag wind_chill_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    hour Weather weather note ECCC glossary page
    day Date/Time date ISO date NA
    day Year year year ECCC glossary page
    day Month month month ECCC glossary page
    day Day day day ECCC glossary page
    day Data Quality qual note ECCC glossary page
    day Max Temp (C) max_temp C ECCC glossary page
    day Max Temp Flag max_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Min Temp (C) min_temp C ECCC glossary page
    day Min Temp Flag min_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Mean Temp (C) mean_temp C ECCC glossary page
    day Mean Temp Flag mean_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Heat Deg Days (C) heat_deg_days C ECCC glossary page
    day Heat Deg Days Flag heat_deg_days_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Cool Deg Days (C) cool_deg_days C ECCC glossary page
    day Cool Deg Days Flag cool_deg_days_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Total Rain (mm) total_rain mm ECCC glossary page
    day Total Rain Flag total_rain_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Total Snow (cm) total_snow cm ECCC glossary page
    day Total Snow Flag total_snow_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Total Precip (mm) total_precip mm ECCC glossary page
    day Total Precip Flag total_precip_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Snow on Grnd (cm) snow_grnd cm ECCC glossary page
    day Snow on Grnd Flag snow_grnd_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Dir of Max Gust (10s deg) dir_max_gust 10s deg ECCC glossary page
    day Dir of Max Gust Flag dir_max_gust_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    day Spd of Max Gust (km/h) spd_max_gust km/h ECCC glossary page
    day Spd of Max Gust Flag spd_max_gust_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Date/Time date ISO date NA
    month Year year year ECCC glossary page
    month Month month month ECCC glossary page
    month Mean Max Temp (C) mean_max_temp C ECCC glossary page
    month Mean Max Temp Flag mean_max_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Mean Min Temp (C) mean_min_temp C ECCC glossary page
    month Mean Min Temp Flag mean_min_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Mean Temp (C) mean_temp C ECCC glossary page
    month Mean Temp Flag mean_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Extr Max Temp (C) extr_max_temp C ECCC glossary page
    month Extr Max Temp Flag extr_max_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Extr Min Temp (C) extr_min_temp C ECCC glossary page
    month Extr Min Temp Flag extr_min_temp_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Total Rain (mm) total_rain mm ECCC glossary page
    month Total Rain Flag total_rain_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Total Snow (cm) total_snow cm ECCC glossary page
    month Total Snow Flag total_snow_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Total Precip (mm) total_precip mm ECCC glossary page
    month Total Precip Flag total_precip_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Snow Grnd Last Day (cm) snow_grnd_last_day cm ECCC glossary page
    month Snow Grnd Last Day Flag snow_grnd_last_day_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Dir of Max Gust (10’s deg) dir_max_gust 10’s deg ECCC glossary page
    month Dir of Max Gust Flag dir_max_gust_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
    month Spd of Max Gust (km/h) spd_max_gust km/h ECCC glossary page
    month Spd of Max Gust Flag spd_max_gust_flag note See the ‘flags’ vignette
